reviewText: Gavin is a 7 year old with brain cancer, he loves it,he has loved them for a long time. One of the first things he played with when he could again. Gavin says "YOU CAN NEVER HAVE TOO MANY CHUGGERS! "

This DVD features six Chuggington episodes all full of train-filled fun. The episodes are all jam-packed with action and the characters teach such great lessons for kids. My kids have watched this show since it started and they still love it. We received the limited edition version of this DVD which comes with a toy train, such a great bonus! Overall though this is a great DVD and perfect to watch one episode at a time or a few.

Episodes:

Delivery Dash at the Docks Special

Sinkhole Rescue

Cormac Patrol

Trainee Camp

Tour Guide Harrison

Delivery Challenge

DVD Bonus Features:

Badge Quest Episodes: Buddy Badge and Follow the Leader

Character Montages: Olwin

Coloring Pages

I received this to review in exchange for sharing my honest opinion.

Every new episode is a plus in my book. My son (and I guilty as charged lol) LOVE Chuggington. He stays sitting with me and watches it all. There a few episodes in this DVD with an awesome stacktrain. For the price, you can't beat it! We all know the trains alone are around $4-8 each! Great price and item!
